put.description:
This api updates total budget, daily budget, max bid of multiple campaigns.

***
#### Request Body Detail
|  **Field**             |  **Type**    |  **Description**                                  |
|-----------------------|---------------|---------------------------------------------------|     
|campaignIds                     |String             |Comma separated campaign ids|
|maxBid           |Number              |max bid of campaign|
|totalBudget       |Number              |  total budget|
|dailyBudget       |Number              |  daily budget|
|totalBudgetUpdateType       |String              |  It is used in case of total budget update. There are three possibilities for this parameter.</br> `change` : It will replace total budget with given value.</br> `addition` : It will add budget to the current total budget.</br> `distribution`: It will distribute given total budget in selected campaigns equally.</br>Default value: `change`|

totalBudgetUpdateType.description: It is used in case of total budget update. There are three possibilities for this parameter. `change` : It will replace total budget with given value. `addition` : It will add budget to the current total budget. `distribution`: It will distribute given total budget in selected campaigns equally. Default value: `change`

example.errorMessage: max bid cannot be less than minimum bid 3.0

reason.errorMessage: max bid cannot be less than minimum bid 3.0
For given campaign_type max bid cannot be less than 1.00 or greater than 1000.
max bid cannot be less than minimum bid 3.0
